column4: i reinstalled going to hoary from warty and now neither vlc or mplayer plays dvds, and have the extra repositories installed
oh wait that's what i said... it' early
adding extra repositories isn't enough. you need to install libdvdcss2 to decrypt commercial DVDs...though i don't understand why the package would be removed
for somereason i thought it installed it by default.
no- it's not a dependency. it's in hoary-extras because it's not legal in the US
Package libdvdcss2 has no installation candidate
i did all that, but i was missing the backports mirror, because when i installed it, it failed the first time
